dc_title_s: New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Newfoundland. And Prince Edward Id. 1855
dc_description_s: Subject: Map of of eastern Canada, including New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Prince Edward Island.|Prime meridian: Washington, D.C. and Greenwich.; Relief shown by hachures.; "Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1855 by J.H. Colton in the clerks office of the District Court for the Southern District of New York."|28 x 36 centimeters|Scale [ca. 1:3,168,000]|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Published by J.H. Colton & Co. no. 172 William St. New York (New York)
